tables.name: example_table1
tables.query: CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE example_table1 (id string, value int) STORED AS CSV LOCATION 's3://${DATA_BUCKET}/table1/';

tables.name: example_table2
tables.query: CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE example_table2 (timestamp timestamp, data string) STORED AS CSV LOCATION 's3://${DATA_BUCKET}/table2/';
